item.title: Installing Code::Blocks

item.title: Installing Code::Blocks in Linux mint
item.description:
Learn how to install and set up Code::Blocks for C programming in Linux‚Äî perfect for beginners!


We‚Äôll also cover how to fix the ‚ÄúGNU GCC Compiler Missing‚Äù problem and create your first C project. Clean visuals, smooth animations, and easy-to-follow explanations.
